Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the extent to which Facebook is removing the share button from "Pro-Trump posts."
Lack enough support: There is no evidence provided to support the claim that Facebook is censoring pro-Trump posts by removing the share button.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the removal of the share button from some posts is a deliberate act by Facebook to suppress free speech.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the absence of the share button on certain posts may be due to the privacy settings chosen by the original poster.
